word:
Unfolding Natural Beauty.--Parents and teachers should seek most earnestly for that wisdom which Jesus is ever ready to give; for they are dealing with human minds at the most interesting and impressible period of their development. They should aim so to cultivate the tendencies of the youth that at each stage of their life 
                                                                           203
they may represent the natural beauty appropriate to that period, unfolding gradually, as do the plants and flowers in the garden. 
                                                                           204
